3bd7ef732e4ec546: $1 tõɔ furi la soŋ. A de-gu-meŋ ŋa na de fo la tu ne konfigiriseŋ ane tontoŋ paalba waabo yaane. A daɛ ŋa ba e ferebo, fo na baŋ kaa a la lɛnnɛɛ zaa fõõ naŋ boɔrɔ. Ka foŋ wa boɔrɔ ka fo leɛ wa a de-gu-meŋɛ ŋa a puoriŋ, fo na baŋ nyɛ o la kyɛ {icon globe} **Applications** puli kyɛ {icon map-o} **Guides**.
7bed49546c4f7ce3: Pampana fo be la a sɔtwaɛ ŋa poɔ, a dabi boɔrɔ kaa iri ŋa na soŋ fo la ka fo zanne a yelbilii. Maa fo meŋɛ kyɛ leɛre yɛlɛ lɛ na fo naŋ na baŋ toŋ soŋ ane welle a nandaare ŋa fo naŋ na tõɔ lɛ.
9996bca0cdf61984: Zanne lɛ fo naŋ na konfigie mail dabogi yobo poɔ.
9f99c9fd6e043aff: Boɔle a fo lambiiri kyɛlɛɛ na ka yɛ piili.
b42a237a5f96cad0: Wagere meŋɛ teɛrɛ ma na baŋ wa la ne wɛbSɔkɛt.
f80e61793246923f: Atentekaaseŋ tereba maŋ bare la tontonneba ka ba na irigyisi die dagere kyɛ kpɛ meŋ.
